title: Continuous Communication Improvement
content: Communication skills require ongoing development. Seek feedback on your communication. Debrief communication failures without blame. Practice difficult conversations before they happen. The best communicators are perpetual students of communication.

mcq.question: After an incident involving miscommunication, what's the most valuable response?

options.B: Analyze the communication breakdown systematically to prevent recurrence

mcq.explanation: Blame finds a scapegoat but doesn't prevent recurrence. Systematic analysis asks: What was intended? What was received? Where did it break down? What would have prevented it? This generates actionable improvements.

openQuestions: When did you last receive specific feedback on your communication?
What aspect of your communication would most benefit from improvement?
